mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_IDX, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_IN_PRDC_CNT, PARENT_CATEGORY_IDX, CATEGORY_DEPT, CATEGORY_USE_YN, CATEGORY_ORDER FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDER ASC

SELECT CATEGORY_IDX, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DEPT, CATEGORY_IN_PRDC_CNT, CATEGORY_USE_YN, CATEGORY_ORDER, PARENT_CATEGORY_IDX, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_DEPT = 2 AND PARENT_CATEGORY_IDX = CG.CATEGORY_IDX) CHILD_CATEGORY_CNT FROM CATEGORY CG WHERE CATEGORY_DEPT = 1 ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDER
